articles.title: Gold and Silver Hit All-Time Highs as Geopolitical Tensions Rise
articles.mainIdea: Gold and Silver Hit All-Time Highs as Geopolitical Tensions Rise
articles.summary: Bloomberg: Gold and Silver Hit All-Time Highs as Geopolitical Tensions Rise. The latest push higher comes as traders bet that the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates twice in 2026, and as US President Donald Trump also advocates for looser monetary policy. Lower rates are typically a tailwind for precious metals, which donâ€™t pay interest. Rising geopolitical tensions are also enhancing the haven appeal of gold and silver. Related tickers mentioned: GC=F, SI=F.

articles.title: Clinton calls for release of all Epstein documents to avoid 'insinuation'
articles.mainIdea: Clinton calls for release of all Epstein documents to avoid 'insinuation'
articles.summary: USA TODAY: Clinton calls for release of all Epstein documents to avoid 'insinuation'. Former President Bill Clinton calls for release of all documents that mention or picture him in the Jeffrey Epstein files.
